DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety Ethinyl estradiol Norgestimate ( EE/NGM ) compare Ethinyl estradiol Desogestrel ( EE/DSG ) , treatment female participant mild moderate acne vulgaris ( pimple ) .
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy Safety Study Comparing Oral Contraceptive Containing Norgestimate Desogestrel Acne Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: This single-blind ( physician know name assign drug ) randomize ( study drug assign chance ) study compare effectiveness safety EE/NGM EE/DSG female participant use oral contraceptive mild moderate acne vulgaris . Tablets EE/NGM EE/DSG administer orally daily 6 month instruct visit evaluation Month 1 , 3 6 post-administration . The efficacy evaluate efficacy primarily total acne lesion count , record evaluation visit . Unused study medication collect drug accountability document . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
